visit_date:
28 Ekim 2020
Bu yorum, bir Tripadvisor üyesinin öznel görüşü olup Tripadvisor LLC şirketine ait değildir. Tripadvisor, yorumlar üzerinde kontroller yapmaktadır.
review_text:
I was craving an Americano in Turkey and finally found it at this lovely cafe. 
they serve everything - all types of dishes, desserts, drinks and alcohol. 
I only tried the coffee, which was good, not sure about the rest.
Devamını okuyun

Bu yorum, bir Tripadvisor üyesinin öznel görüşü olup Tripadvisor LLC şirketine ait değildir. Tripadvisor, yorumlar üzerinde kontroller yapmaktadır.
review_text:
Asked for a coffee. Was offered a list of beers. Had a beer. Good wifi and music. Limited menu but very relaxing. Rahat. Comfortable. Frequent buses outside.
Devamını okuyun
